about:
Hey world,
World of MINECRAFT that is.
Yep Minecraft  is my game.
Avicus is my sever
And Nebula is my fav. Gamemode.
I have been playing since 1.4.7 so I am not a noob
When you are playing Nebula and you get hit with an arrow from above and fall into the void. You are thinks DARN IT. Well thats me:The sniper. When you are thinking DARN IT I am happy and laughing at you cuz I just picked off another of you. That is how I spend my day, plugging away kills in Minecraft : Sniping. Well I know what you are thinking "I will just come up and kill you pvp you." Well I have nasty melee tactics.  So back off.
So thats me. 
I hope to see you on Nebula Soon.
So for Now 
Goodbye
And happy MINECRAFTING,
Soccerboss000
interests: Soccer, sports, MINECRAFT, Reading, Science, and stuff
